channel.title: CVE Feed for Pdfcrowd -- Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd

item.title: CVE-2023-40668|2024-09-23T12:54:12.258Z -- pdfcrowd -- save%20as%20pdf%20plugin%20by%20pdfcrowd
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Pdfcrowd Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd plugin <=Â 2.16.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-33684|2024-08-02T02:36:04.549Z -- pdfcrowd -- save%20as%20pdf%20plugin%20by%20pdfcrowd
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Pdfcrowd Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd: from n/a through 3.2.0.
